actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the investment credit provisions of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an incentive for the production of passenger automobiles with fuel consumption rates of 20 miles per gallon or more.

summary.text: Automobile Efficiency Tax Incentive Act - Provides that the investment tax credit allowed under the Internal Revenue Code for automobile manufacturers shall be directly proportional to the production of passenger automobiles by such manufacturers with fuel consumption rates of 20 miles per gallon or more.

titles.title: A bill to amend the investment credit provisions of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an incentive for the production of passenger automobiles with fuel consumption rates of 20 miles per gallon or more.
